ingredients: 1 box spaghetti of choice, 1 bottle red sauce of choice, 1 pound ground beef, parmesean cheese, salt, pepper, sugar
directions: Bring water to boil in saucepan. Add pasta. Boil for 8-9 minutes or until pasta is tender. While pasta is boiling, cook ground beef over medium-high heat in pan. After cooked, add sauce, salt, pepper, and sugar into the pan. Heat, stir, serve.
extras: Add parmasean cheese on top if wanted!

ingredients: 1 bag ramen, 2 eggs, carrots, corn, sriracha sauce, basil
Chicken breasts, 1 bag uncle ben bagged rice - rice pilaf flavor, lemons, poultry seasoning
1 box velveeta mac n cheese, milk, butter, 1 lb ground beef, salt & pepper
directions: Cook mac n cheese according to box. Cook ground beef in pan with salt n pepper. Mix them up. Nice.
extras: Add hot sauce, bread crumbs, ground up flaming hot cheetos for extra intense flavor

directions: Slice zuchinni, put peperonni and slices of cheese on top, place on baking sheet, bake in oven on 400 for like 18-20 minutes or something.
